model_short_description: Audio distortion effect using Knowledge Distillation for compression.
model_long_description: Audio distortion effect using RNN LSTM neural networks and Knowledge Distillation for compression.
technical_description: Knowledge distillation is an ML compression technique where knowledge from larger teacher networks are distilled into smaller student networks. We explore how knowledge distillation can be used to optimize virtual-analog models of audio distortion effects. In particular, we propose an audio-to-audio LSTM architecture for real-time regression tasks where student networks are trained to mimic the internal representations of teachers, known as feature-based knowledge distillation.
